content.description: The diagram provided illustrates the marginal private benefit <math alttext="(M P B)" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>MPB</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, marginal social benefit <math alttext="(M S B)" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>MSB</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, marginal private cost <math alttext="(M P C)" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>MPC</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and marginal social cost <math alttext="(M S C)" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>MSC</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> measured in dollars for a competitive market.
content.question: Assume that the goal of the government is to increase efficiency in the market. The cost of a government intervention that increases market output from <math alttext="Q sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="Q sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="$1.2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext></mtext><mtext>$1.2</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> million. The intervention will definitely improve market efficiency if the area of

choices.label: <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is greater than <math alttext="$1.2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext></mtext><mtext>$1.2</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> million

<math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is less than <math alttext="$1.2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext></mtext><mtext>$1.2</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> million

<math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is less than <math alttext="$1.2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext></mtext><mtext>$1.2</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> million

<math alttext="A plus B" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>A+B</mtext></mrow></math> is greater than or equal to <math alttext="$1.2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext></mtext><mtext>$1.2</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> million

content.answer: <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is greater than <math alttext="$1.2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext></mtext><mtext>$1.2</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> million
